about_the_game:
[Fusion, Synthesis, Coalescence]

"MASH VP! Re:VISION" is a revolutionary rhythm game that “fuses” two lanes and music into a completely new experience.

With a variety of tracks, game modes, and a creativity-driven mashup system, it invites you into a new world of music.

1. Innovative Two-Lane System

Featuring the groundbreaking Two-Lane System, which redefines the rhythm game experience.

  • LIGHT MIX: A simple and intuitive two-lane style for beginners.

  • HARD MIX: A challenging and thrilling four-lane style for advanced players.

With 7 types of charts, from beginner-friendly to advanced levels, you’ll find the perfect way to play.

2. Recreate Music Through Mashups

Experience the unique MASH UP mode, where you combine tracks played in FREE PLAY to create completely new songs.

Bring out the unique qualities of each track and enjoy a surprising and creative music experience!

The Mashup mode doesn’t just mix tracks—it blends rhythms and melodies seamlessly into a completely original composition.

Popular songs like “Brain Power” and “Halcyon” can also be mashed up!

The Two-Lane System enhances the mashup experience, maximizing its creative potential.

3. An Extensive Lineup of Tracks

Featuring 115+ tracks by some of the most iconic artists in the rhythm game scene!

Renowned artists from Japan, Korea, the U.S., and beyond come together to deliver a diverse musical lineup.

You can even try out the following tracks for free in the MASH VP! Re:VISION Demo:

[FREE PLAY]

  • Tutorial / AXTORM

  • off duty / TORIENA

  • Blue Streams / DJ Noriken

  • Re:LIVE / TAG & NAOKI feat. 小坂りゆ

  • 踊れRave on / 謎のユニット（from AXTORM LABEL)

  • Brain Power / NOMA

  • Halcyon / xi

[MASH UP]

  • Blue Streams x off duty

  • off duty　x Brain Power

  • Brain Power　x　Halcyon

Buying the full version of the game gives you access to the above songs plus many more, totalling more than 115+ songs!

4. Advanced Customization Support

Comprehensive Game Options

In addition to essential rhythm game options like high-speed settings and judgment timing adjustments, enjoy further options that ensure a comfortable experience.

Shift Effect Adjustment: Reduce camera shake and effects in DISPLAY OPTIONS. Whether you prefer full immersion or focused gameplay, the choice is yours.

Key Customization: Configure the key layout for optimal comfort, allowing you to create your own ideal play environment. Controller support is also available.

  • ASIO Audio Output Support

At AXTORM, every developer is a passionate rhythm gamer. We understand the importance of audio latency in rhythm games.

"MASH VP! Re:VISION" uses the FMOD audio engine and supports ASIO audio drivers, enabling low-latency gameplay.

Enjoy a seamless and immersive rhythm game experience with the best responsiveness and sound quality!

Now, embark on a journey into a new world of music!

※Ghost Battle Mode is not playable in the MASH VP! Re:VISION Demo.
